name: traveltime-api
description: TravelTime API SDK for node js with TypeScript

scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf target && rm -f main.ts
scripts.release: npm run clean && npm i && npm run build && npm publish
scripts.release-rc: npm run clean && npm i && npm run build && npm publish --tag rc

author: TravelTime <support@traveltime.com> (https://traveltime.com/)
